text: @afneil Our so called leaders lack the vision or authority to stamp down and control #COVID19, all we get is false promises and  failed ever changing polices. Ports and airports still open with no testing is a farce, the lack of testing is down to the government's lack of structure 1/2

entity.description: BBC journalist and broadcaster, chairman of Press Holdings Media Group, whose titles include The Spectator, and the ITP Media Group.
